Index.title: Create AI Chatbots for Messenger & WhatsApp
Index.description: Our platform allows you to build, train, and deploy powerful AI chatbots for your business without writing a single line of code. Automate conversations, engage customers, and handle support effortlessly.

Auth.loginDescription: Enter your credentials to access your dashboard.
Auth.registerDescription: Start building your AI chatbot in minutes.

Metadata.title: AI Chatbot Builder for Messenger & WhatsApp
Metadata.description: Build no-code AI chatbots to automate conversations on Facebook Messenger and WhatsApp. Engage customers, handle support, and generate leads.
Metadata.keywords: chatbot, ai, messenger, whatsapp, saas, automation, no-code
